articles.description: Watch on Match of the Day Wales and listen to BBC Radio Wales and BBC Radio Cymru commentary as Wales take on Denmark in the Women's Nations League at the Energi Viborg Arena.
articles.title: Women's Nations League: Denmark v Wales - watch & listen

articles.description: Live text updates as Republic of Ireland face Albania followed by Northern Ireland against Hungary in the Women's Nations League qualifiers, live on BBC iPlayer and BBC Sport website.
articles.title: Updates as Republic of Ireland face Albania before Northern Ireland v Hungary

articles.description: England travel to Belgium for a crucial meeting in the Women's Nations League.
articles.title: Women's Nations League: Build-up to Belgium v England - Kirby starts

articles.description: Fakhar Zaman scores a rapid 81 as Pakistan race to a seven-wicket win over Bangladesh in Kolkata.
articles.title: Pakistan race to victory to eliminate Bangladesh

articles.description: An indoor "high-tech golf league" - launched by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy and backed by Stephen Curry and the Williams sisters - starts on 9 January.
articles.title: Woods and McIlroy golf league launches in January

articles.description: Hosting a men's World Cup has long been an ambition for Saudi Arabia writes BBC sports editor Dan Roan, but questions and intense scrutiny will remain.
articles.title: Why Saudi 2034 World Cup should not surprise anyone

articles.description: Jonny May, England's second highest try scorer of all time, says "words can't describe the journey that I've been on".
articles.title: England wing May retires from international rugby

articles.description: Watch highlights as Pakistan easily beat Bangladesh by seven-wickets in Kolkata to knock the Tigers out of the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Pakistan win comfortably to knock out Bangladesh

articles.description: Despite their disastrous World Cup campaign Jos Buttler is the right person to lead England through the turbulent time that will follow, says former bowler Steven Finn.
articles.title: 'Buttler still the man to lead England through turbulent time'

articles.description: Italy was already in love, but now Tottenham goalkeeper Guglielmo Vicario is showing English fans how good he is, writes Mina Rzouki.
articles.title: 'Italy was in love - now Vicario is showing Spurs how good he is'
